member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_FreeSystemBuffer
member.summary: Retrieves the number of unused bytes in the internal data buffer that is used for writing to disc.
member.param: Size, in bytes, of the unused portion of the internal data buffer that is used for writing to disc.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_LastReadLba
member.summary: Retrieves the address of the sector most recently read from the burn image.
member.param: Logical block address of the sector most recently read from the input data stream.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_LastWrittenLba
member.summary: Retrieves the address of the sector most recently written to the device.
member.param: Logical block address of the sector most recently written to the device.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_SectorCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of sectors to write to the device in the current write operation.
member.param: The number of sectors to write in the current write operation.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_StartLba
member.summary: Retrieves the starting logical block address (LBA) of the current write operation.
member.param: Starting logical block address of the write operation. Negative values for LBAs are supported.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_TotalSystemBuffer
member.summary: Retrieves the size of the internal data buffer that is used for writing to disc.
member.param: Size, in bytes, of the internal data buffer that is used for writing to disc.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs.get_UsedSystemBuffer
member.summary: Retrieves the number of used bytes in the internal data buffer that is used for writing to disc.
member.param: Size, in bytes, of the used portion of the internal data buffer that is used for writing to disc.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteEngine2EventArgs
member.summary: Use this interface to retrieve information about the current write operation. This interface is passed to the method that you implement.
